reviews.review_msg: This guy's just the sweetest. Dude's really passionate about his work and really wants his students to be interested in it as well. Lectures are boring unless you're actually interested in the content. Assignments aren't too hard either. A great UD for CMNS or non-CMNS students!

The only test is the midterm! I really liked this class, he does a really good job because he is actually IN the field, not just a prof. He's really passionate about what he teaches. Can talk for a long time. Cool field trips. Cool projects. Brings in a lot of great guest speakers too. Videos. You also get a cert. in emergency management from JIBC!
